desc: Butterfly Superfoods offers the best tasting nut butters available! Blending organic raw walnuts, cashews, and macadamia nuts and more, our nut butters have a great taste and will leave you wanting more. Offering Cinnamon Vanilla Nut Butter, Chocolate Reishi Nut Butter, Rosemary Nut Butter and our Classic Nut Butter.
